required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of Systane速 Balance in Dry Eye Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Evaluation of Systane速 Balance on Corneal Staining in Indian Subjects With Dry Eye

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Systane速 Balance following 90 days of QID (4 times/day) dosing among Indian subjects with dry eye. This study will be conducted in India.

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Corneal Staining Score at all study time points
primary_outcome.description: Corneal staining will be assessed by the Investigator through slit-lamp examination.

arm_group.description: Propylene Glycol 0.6% eye drops, 1 drop QID (with the last dose of each day at bedtime) in each eye for 90 days

facility.name: Contact Alcon India for Trial Locations
